data.title: Mollösund climate: Average Temperature by month, Mollösund water temperature
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Mollösund

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Mollösund

>>average temperature by month Mollösund

>>Weather Mollösund

>>Water temperature Mollösund

The climate here is considered warm and temperate. In Mollösund, precipitation is notable throughout the entirety of the year, with even its most arid month still experiencing a considerable amount of rainfall. This climate is considered to be Cfb according to the Köppen-Geiger climate classification. The average temperature in Mollösund is 8.6 °C | 47.5 °F. The annual precipitation in this location is approximately 1061 mm | 41.8 inch.

The designated area is positioned within the northern hemisphere of our globe. The warm and pleasant days of the Summer season commence towards the conclusion of June and come to an end in September. This particular period includes a span of months, namely: June, July, August, September.

average temperature by month Mollösund

The month of highest temperature is July during which the average temperature reaches up to 17.3 °C | 63.2 °F. During the month of February, there is a notable drop in temperature, with an average low of approximately 0.6 °C | 33.2 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Mollösund

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The precipitation variance between the months with the lowest and highest levels of rainfall is 74 mm | 3 inch. The degree of fluctuation in the yearly temperature is approximately 16.7 °C | 30.0 °F.

In terms of relative humidity, the month that exhibits the highest level is November with a percentage of 73.08. Conversely, May has been recorded as having the lowest amount of relative humidity at only 73.08. It is noteworthy that November has the highest number of rainy days, amounting to 15.90, whereas the month with the least rainfall is April, experiencing only 9.80 wet days.

Mollösund weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Mollösund

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

On average, the location of Mollösund records the highest number of daily sunshine hours during June. The mean duration of sunlight per day in this month is approximately 12.58, with a total cumulative count reaching up to 377.5.

On average, Mollösund records the lowest daily sunshine hours in January. During this period, there is an average of 2.72 hours of sunlight per day and a total accumulation of 84.35 hours.

Throughout the year, a total of 2703.02 hours of light are recorded in the location of Mollösund. The monthly average for sunlight is approximately 88.65 hours.

Water temperature Mollösund(Kattegat)

Max. Water temperature °C (°F) Avg. Water Temperature °C (°F) Min. Water Temperature °C (°F)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

The average annual water temperature of Kattegat in the city of Mollösund is recorded to be approximately 10.00°C | 50.00°F.

When the water content reaches 19.10°C | 66.38°F, it is observed that during August of each year, there is a significant increase in the average monthly temperature. Conversely, around 2.00°C | 35.60°F, particularly in March, we observe an opposite trend where temperatures hit their lowest point.

At its highest, the water temperature reaches around 19.10°C | 66.38°F in the year on August 02. The lowest value is around 2.00°C | 35.60°F, which occurs on approximately March 01.

The body of water in closest proximity to Mollösund is identified as the Kattegat.

Airport close to Mollösund

The closest Airports of Mollösund are: Trollhättan-Vänersborg Airport (THN) 52.90km,Gothenburg-Landvetter Airport (GOT) 66.38km,Jönköping Airport (JKG) 157.48km

You can reach Mollösund from this Cities by Plane: London (LGW), Copenhagen (CPH), Paris (CDG), Birmingham (BHX), Lyon (LYS), Oslo (OSL), Alicante (ALC), Málaga (AGP), Stockholm (BMA), Riga (RIX), Frankfurt am Main (FRA), Stavanger (SVG), Rome (FCO), Barcelona (BCN), Berlin (TXL), Amsterdam (AMS), Palma de Mallorca (PMI), Helsinki (HEL), Split (SPU), Halmstad (HAD)
